attributes.action: Regulate cannabis the same as alcohol.
attributes.additional_details:
Alcohol is a legal recreational drug. There is a substantial body of evidence to show that drugs, such as alcohol, are harmful and can damage people’s mental and physical health, & our wider communities. Evidence from around the world shows us, that the use of alcohol is a significant public health issue & can unquestionably cause harm to individuals & society.

Given the greater harms caused by alcohol, the Government cannot justify criminalising people for the recreational use of cannabis.
attributes.background:
keeping cannabis illegal is not evidence based, you cannot justify criminalising people for cannabis, when it is scientifically proven to be 114× safer than alcohol, a legal recreational drug.
